statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockFeed;
SELECT feed_name, feed_quantity FROM LivestockFeed WHERE livestock_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeed WHERE feed_quantity >= 10.5;
SELECT livestock_id, feed_name FROM LivestockFeed ORDER BY feeding_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeed WHERE feed_quantity < 5 AND feeding_time > '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeed WHERE feed_quantity > 5 ORDER BY feeding_time DESC
SELECT feed_name, feed_quantity FROM LivestockFeed WHERE livestock_id = 2 ORDER BY feed_quantity ASC
SELECT id, feed_name, feeding_time FROM LivestockFeed WHERE feeding_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT DISTINCT livestock_id FROM LivestockFeed ORDER BY livestock_id
SELECT feed_name, SUM(feed_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM LivestockFeed GROUP BY feed_name HAVING total_quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM feed_plan;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content, quantity FROM feed_plan WHERE feed_type='Dry';
SELECT nutrition_name, vitamins FROM nutrition_plan WHERE calorie_content > 200;
SELECT feed_name, feed_type, protein_content FROM feed_plan ORDER BY protein_content DESC;
SELECT nutrition_name, minerals FROM nutrition_plan WHERE minerals LIKE '%Iron%';
SELECT * FROM feed_plan WHERE protein_content > 10 AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT feed_name, feed_type, quantity FROM feed_plan WHERE feed_type = 'dry' ORDER BY feed_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content, quantity FROM feed_plan WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY protein_content ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM nutrition_plan WHERE vitamins LIKE '%C%' OR vitamins LIKE '%D%' ORDER BY nutrition_name ASC;
SELECT nutrition_name, minerals FROM nutrition_plan WHERE calorie_content > 300 ORDER BY nutrition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_feed;
SELECT id, name, ingredient FROM livestock_feed ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feed_records WHERE livestock_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, target_weight, calorie_requirements FROM nutrition_plans WHERE calorie_requirements > 1500;
SELECT id, plan_name, plan_description FROM nutrition_plans WHERE target_weight <= 1000 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_feed WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY feeding_time DESC;
SELECT name, ingredient, quantity FROM livestock_feed WHERE ingredient LIKE '%grass%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, target_weight, calorie_requirements, protein_requirements FROM nutrition_plans WHERE calorie_requirements > 500 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT fr.id, lf.name, fr.feed_time, fr.quantity_given FROM feed_records fr INNER JOIN livestock_feed lf ON fr.feed_id = lf.id WHERE lf.name = 'Hay' ORDER BY fr.feed_time DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM nutrition_plans WHERE protein_requirements > 20 ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock
SELECT id, name, species FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT id, name, weight FROM Livestock WHERE species='Cattle'
SELECT * FROM Feed WHERE price < 10
SELECT plan_name, description, required_nutrients FROM NutritionPlan
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT name, species FROM Livestock WHERE weight < 100 AND species = 'Cow';
SELECT id, name, age FROM Livestock WHERE species IN ('Goat', 'Sheep') ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT p.plan_name, p.description, f.name AS feed_name FROM NutritionPlan p JOIN Feed f ON p.id = f.id;
SELECT s.feeding_time, f.name AS feed_name, f.type FROM FeedingSchedule s LEFT JOIN Feed f ON s.feed_id = f.id;
SELECT * FROM livestock_feed;
SELECT name, fat_content, protein_content FROM livestock_feed;
SELECT id, name, protein_content, fiber_content FROM livestock_feed ORDER BY protein_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM feed_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT feed_name, price_per_unit FROM feed_inventory WHERE expiry_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM livestock_feed WHERE protein_content > 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, weight, age FROM livestock_animals WHERE species = 'Cow' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT feed_name, quantity, price_per_unit FROM feed_inventory WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT livestock_animals.name, feed_inventory.feed_name, feeding_schedule.feeding_time FROM livestock_animals JOIN feeding_schedule ON livestock_animals.id = feeding_schedule.animal_id JOIN feed_inventory ON feed_inventory.id = feeding_schedule.feed_id ORDER BY feeding_schedule.feeding_time DESC;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content, fat_content FROM livestock_feed JOIN feed_nutritional_info ON livestock_feed.id = feed_nutritional_info.feed_id WHERE protein_content < 15 AND fat_content < 10;
